cause.description:
The face of AIDS has changed, those afflicted with the disease are living longer. However, their need for support and services has not diminisehd. This cause seeks to support those organizations that address the advances that have been made and the work that has yet to be done.
In addition, AIDS is a completely preventable disease. Help to create a world in which your children will only learn about it through history books. Support those organizations that encourage regular HIV testing through public outreach programs, prevention education, and targeting at-risk populations.
1. AIDS is a completely preventable disease.
2. Fight AIDS now through prevention and education.
cause.mission: promote AIDS awareness, support those currently affected by HIV and AIDS, and fight to end AIDS by encouraging HIV testing.
cause.name: End AIDS now.
